https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rFU7myhi7p4l2CJiPhq0RouW23O.jpg There is no normal. We all wear masks. Applecart is a portmanteau film featuring stories dealing with the perversions, shame, rage, and secrets we all keep hidden. Applecart is presented to you as an experimental silent film with a unique sound design and stunning black and white cinematography. It is graphic, transgressive, and honest. Applecart
